title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Jul 08 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Monday, 08 July 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: Alex exposes scandal-driven federal agencies on this Monday, July 8 transmission of The Alex Jones Show. Alex speaks with Larry Pratt, executive director of Gun Owners of America about the ATF pressuring and arming people to rob fictitious drug "stash houses" in sting operations as well as the latest on Operation Fast and Furious. This ATF gunwalking scandal claimed another life over the weekend as a drug cartel member gunned down a Mexican police chief with a rifle lost by the agency. 

Alex also examines yet another federal agency scandal: the TSA groped, screened, and interviewed the panicking family members of Asiana Airlines Flight 214 crash victims who had no idea whether their loved ones were still alive. The TSA stood in the way of their reunions for up to five hours. 

Alex also speaks with radio host Adam Kokesh who recently loaded a 12 gauge shotgun in Freedom Plaza near the White House during his D.C. open carry protest on the 4th of July.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
